Interface CloseableDataBuffer

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, DataBuffer
public interface CloseableDataBuffer extends DataBuffer, AutoCloseable
Extension of DataBuffer that allows for buffers that can be used in a try-with-resources statement.
Since:
6.0
Author:
Arjen Poutsma

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface DataBuffer

    DataBuffer.ByteBufferIterator, DataBuffer.ByteProcessor

    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Closes this data buffer, freeing any resources.

    • close

      void close()
      Closes this data buffer, freeing any resources.
